content: among us there may be an imposter are you friend or foe crewmate or imposter this is a fun free and easy to follow crochet among us amigurumi pattern for a basic crewmate figure bonus pattern for the dead crewmate body is included as well these crewmates live on a spaceship and carry out their assignments please be careful though as among them there may be an imposter or two intent on sabotage and foul play video tutorial is also available with the free written pattern so you can crochet along with me as well happy crocheting cheers ami amour ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ **instagram** make sure you tag me with your projects on instagram @ami_amour 1 i d love to see **youtube** check out my youtube channel 2 to catch all my crochet tutorials and projects ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ **approximate size ** 5in/13cm tall **level** easy intermediate **need to know ** single_crochet how to increase how to decrease how to sew parts together 1 https //www instagram com/ami_amour 2 https //www youtube com/c/amiamour
